Description: The First Integrated Growth Management Platform for Digital Marketers.
Name: Insider

Methods.Name: Create Events via Upserting Users
Methods.Description: Submit new events including user attributes.

Methods.Name: Create Events
Methods.Description: Submit new events for existing users.

Methods.Name: Delete User
Methods.Description: Each request must have a unifier field under identifiers object, which is decided by customer. For example, if a customer decides email field as unifier, data without email field will not be accepted.

Methods.Name: Upsert Users
Methods.Description: Create or Update a users attributes.
